name: Chromos
description: Chromos, Chromos is a colorful experience about a fight between Chromos, the god of colors and Iris, a young and ambitious being aspiring to his throne. The game has been made in 10 days for the VimJam2 by a trio : bl4st [Twitter] Code / Design / Visuals Embraysite [Youtube] Code / Design / Visuals Oclidian [Bandcamp] [Contact] Music / Sfx
